item.title: TikTok Influencers Needed for Magnesium Supplement Promos - $60-$80/hr - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are a well-known health supplement brand specializing in magnesium products. We are looking for TikTok influencers to create and post short promotional videos for our product on their TikTok accounts. This is a great opportunity to collaborate with a reputable brand and showcase your creativity.

Tasks:

Create engaging and high-quality promotional videos for our magnesium supplement
Post the videos on your TikTok account
Follow our guidelines and scripts to highlight the key features and benefits of our product
Include shopping links or shopping carts in the videos to facilitate purchases

Work Schedule:

Flexible working hours, can be done from home
Long-term task with potential for ongoing collaboration
Compensation:

$60-$80 per hour
Free product samples for the promotional videos
15-20% commission on sales, which goes to the creator

Requirements:

Active TikTok account with a follower count of at least 1,000
Experience in creating and editing TikTok videos
Ability to follow instructions and meet deadlines
Ability to include shopping links or shopping carts in the videos

How to Apply:
Please submit your TikTok handle and a brief introduction about your experience. Include links to your previous work or TikTok videos.



Hourly Range: $60.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 06:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok
Skills: TikTok
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
